text: allahu oru manusyanreyum ullil rant hrdayannaluntakkiyittilla. ninnal “lihar” ceyyunna bharyamare ninnalute matakkalakkiyittilla. ninnalilekkucerttuvilikkunnavare ninnalute putranmarakkiyittumilla. ateakke ninnalute vayakeantulla verum vakkukalan. allahu satyam parayunnu. avan nervaliyil nayikkukayum ceyyunnu
